title: Hot Vampire Next Door: Season Two
description: "Be a good girl for me, Mouse."Secrets are starting to come out about my past and the only thing that feels real anymore is my annoyingly hot vampire neighbor, Bran Duval.He made me a promise to help me uncover my past, but I didn't know those promises included the heat of his touch. Bran and I don't always see eye to eye, but when we're alone together in the dark, everything feels right, even if some of the things he does to me might be so very bad.As my Pledge draws nearer, and more secrets come out, I can't help but wonder: who am I? Or better yet, what am I?
author: Nikki St. Crowe
